body: The body of Jennifer Habib, a 10- year-old autistic girl who had wandered from her sleeping father Saturday, was found yesterday in Gerritsen Creek in Marine Park in Brooklyn, the police said. The girl, who could utter sounds but could not speak, had drowned, the police said, adding that there was no indication of foul play. Jennifer had lived with
title: Brooklyn Girl Found Drowned

body: For the first play he ever directed, back in 1970, Gerald Gutierrez of Brooklyn's Marine Park community was already working with talent. Kevin Kline and Patty LuPone were the leads, playing Adam and Eve. ''And John Houseman played the Voice of God - of course ,'' the tall, 34-year-old director said the other day with a warm smile. That directorial
title: A DIRECTOR WITH AUTHENTICITY

body: Sunday morning, while some New Yorkers are planning a warm day indoors, James Barry will step into his boots and head for a five-mile hike along the Palisades with fellow members of Conservation and the Outdoors, a nonprofit environmental group. ''It's addictive,'' said Mr. Barry, a 72-year old retired postal worker. Once you start going out, you
title: WORLD OF WINTER HIKES, AND DON'T FORGET BOOTS
